Work_Experience.Title: Data Scientist Intern
Responsibilities: Developed an advanced document parser capable of extracting structured and unstructured content from HR policy documents with 93% accuracy. This included parsing tables, images, and text sections to improve document accessibility and analysis.

Implemented NLP-based classification algorithms to automatically segment and extract crucial sections from HR compliance documents, ensuring that important policies could be easily located and referenced.
